description: Try our easy to follow Simple Mushroom Schnitzels With Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salads,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Mar 2020,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Mushroom
name: Simple Mushroom Schnitzels With Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Whisk 3 eggs in a bowl. Place stuffing mix in a bowl. Dip mushrooms into egg then mix. Repeat for a second coat.
Place mushrooms on a bakingpaper lined tray. Spray well with oil, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Season.
Meanwhile, place remaining eggs in pan of warm water over medium heat. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 61/2 minutes. Cool in iced water. Peel.
Toss salad with dressing from the kit. Divide salad among bowls and top with mushrooms, cheese from the kit and halved eggs.
